fields.description: This is a unique identifier for the portal payment session.
The portal application sends this external merchant id to the payment provider to pay the associated merchant.
This is the payment amount you are requesting the external payment provider to pay on your behalf. Note: This amount could be different from actual amount paid.
This is the actual amount the external payment provider pays. It can be different from the requested amount.
A unique ID for a payment associated with a payment provider.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
This is the timeout timestamp for the customer portal payment session. After passing this timestamp, the payment session will be considered expired.
This is the reference to customer payments associated with the session. Workday won't process a Payment Session if recorded payments already exist for that session.
An element containing all customer invoice data for this customer portal payment session.

Currency_Reference_Currency_ID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Currency_Reference_Currency_Numeric_Code.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Currency_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Customer_Invoice_data.description: An element containing all customer invoice data for this customer portal payment session.

External_Merchant_ID.description: The portal application sends this external merchant id to the payment provider to pay the associated merchant.

External_Payment_Record.description: A unique ID for a payment associated with a payment provider.

ID.description: This is a unique identifier for the portal payment session.

Payment_Amount_Actual.description: This is the actual amount the external payment provider pays. It can be different from the requested amount.

Payment_Amount_Requested.description: This is the payment amount you are requesting the external payment provider to pay on your behalf. Note: This amount could be different from actual amount paid.

Payment_Session_Timeout_Timestamp.description: This is the timeout timestamp for the customer portal payment session. After passing this timestamp, the payment session will be considered expired.

Recorded_Customer_Payments_Reference.description: This is the reference to customer payments associated with the session. Workday won't process a Payment Session if recorded payments already exist for that session.
